description: multiple victoria class submarine spares requisites for o-rings, filters and cartridges, see tender description below for specifics
full_summary:
### Multiple Victoria-Class Submarine Spares - O-Rings, Filters and Cartridges

#### [Request for Proposal] (Demande de propositions)

**Tender Number**: W8482-242280/A

**Tender Closing Date**: March 22, 2024, 2:00 PM (ET)

**Location of Delivery**: CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide various spares for Victoria-Class submarines, including O-rings, filters, and cartridges.

**Scope of Requirements**

The following items are required:

* O-rings (items 1 and 2) - 60 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* Cartridges (items 3 and 4) - 9 and 4 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* O-rings (items 5 and 6) - 300 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* Retainer, packing (items 9 and 10) - 600 and 200 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* Cartridge, shut-off valve (items 11 and 12) - 6 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* Filter element, fluid (items 13 and 14) - 6 and 2 pieces each, delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax

**Instructions to Bidders**

* Bidders must submit their proposals in English or French
* Proposals must include a detailed description of the product offered, including the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE number
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### [commercial agreements](accords commerciaux)

This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible to bid under the following agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
